title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 342.2 - Purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 342.2 - Purposes

State Regulations

The council of presidents shall advise the chancellor on
proposed university-wide policy and inter-campus programs. Members of the
council shall act as liaison with the other presidents of the university, bringing their view-points and judgment to the attention of the chancellor to
strengthen the development of university policy. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
342.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
